collectionSummary.title: Collection Summary
collectionSummary.start_time: Start time (24H): Time at which blood begins to enter the apheresis disposable
collectionSummary.end_time: End time (24H): Completion of apheresis procedure at end of rinseback

shipmentReceipt.title: Verify Shipper
shipmentReceipt.enter_coi: Scan or enter the COI Number found on the shipper label

shipmentReceiptCheck.title: Shipment Receipt Checklist
shipmentReceiptCheck.list_serial_number: List the serial number of the temperature monitoring device (if applicable to your country): (Optional)
shipmentReceiptCheck.list_security_seal_number: List the security seal number on the shipper (if applicable to your country): (Optional)
shipmentReceiptCheck.additional_comments: Please enter additional comments about the receipt. (Optional)
shipmentReceiptCheck.does_temp_confirm2: Does the downloaded temperature data from the temperature monitoring device conform to the Janssen shipping profile? If there is an unexpected spike and the temperature goes out-of-range (2-8°C) during transit, contact Janssen immediately for further instructions.
shipmentReceiptCheck.does_temp_confirm_cccp: Does the downloaded temperature data from the temperature monitoring device conform to the Janssen shipping profile? If there is an unexpected spike and the temperature goes out-of-range (2-8°C) during transit, please contact your Janssen Cell Therapy Coordinator immediately for further instructions.
shipmentReceiptCheck.does_temp_confirm3: Does the downloaded temperature data from the temperature monitoring device conform to the Janssen shipping profile? If there is an unexpected spike and the temperature goes out-of-range (2-8°C) during transit, please contact your Janssen Cell Therapy Coordinator immediately for further instructions.
shipmentReceiptCheck.does_temp_confirm: Does the downloaded temperature data from the temperature monitoring device conform to the Janssen shipping profile? If there is an unexpected spike and the temperature goes out-of-range (2-8C) during transit, contact Janssen immediately for further instructions.
shipmentReceiptCheck.does_temp_confirmCccpJp: Does the downloaded temperature data from the temperature monitoring device conform to the Janssen shipping profile? If there is an unexpected spike and the temperature goes out-of-range (2-8°C) during transit, please contact your Janssen Cell Therapy Coordinator immediately for further instructions.
shipmentReceiptCheck.cry_aph_bag: Is the apheresis bag inside the shipper in the expected condition (e.g. no bag damage, label adhered)? If the apheresis bag is damaged or not in expected condition, please refer to the Janssen Shipping Instructions for further instructions.
shipmentReceiptCheck.cold_shipper: Will the apheresis bag be kept in the cold shipper until time of cryopreservation? If not, please record the 2-8C storage unit the apheresis bag is kept in until time of cryopreservation. (If not applicable, select NO and then enter "N/A" in comments box under question)
shipmentReceiptCheck.cold_Shipper2: Will the apheresis bag be kept in the cold shipper until time of cryopreservation? If not, please record the 2-8°C storage unit the apheresis bag is kept in until time of cryopreservation. (If not applicable, select NO and then enter "N/A" in comments box under question)
shipmentReceiptCheck.cold_shipperCccpJp: Will the apheresis bag be kept in the cold shipper until time of cryopreservation? If not, please record the 2-8°C storage unit the apheresis bag is kept in until time of cryopreservation. (If not applicable, select NO and then enter "N/A" in comments box under question)

shipmentReceiptSummary.additional_comments: Please enter additional comments about the receipt.
shipmentReceiptSummary.confirmer_text: I confirm that the information entered is complete and accurate.
shipmentReceiptSummary.verifier_text: I verify that the information entered is complete and accurate.

satLabCryopreservation.title: Cryopreservation
satLabCryopreservation.number_bags: Number of bags formulated for cryopreservation?

satLabCryopreservationLabels.title: Cryopreservation Labels
satLabCryopreservationLabels.identifier_bag: Identify the label for Bag 1 which ends with PRC-01.
satLabCryopreservationLabels.scan_cassette: Scan or enter the COI bag identifier on Cassette 1.
satLabCryopreservationLabels.scan_bag: Scan or enter the COI bag identifier on Bag 1.
satLabCryopreservationLabels.verify_bag: Verify labels have been attached to all collection bags
satLabCryopreservationLabels.confirm_prompt: I confirm that the information entered is complete and accurate.

satLabBagStorage.title: Bag Storage
satLabBagStorage.coi_scan_descEU: Scan or Enter the COI-based bag identifier for moving bag to storage (Bag 1)
satLabBagStorage.coi_scan_desc: Scan or enter the COI bag identifier on Cassette 1.

satLabCryopreservationData.title: Cryopreservation Data
satLabCryopreservationData.scan_bag: Scan or enter the bag identifier prior to entering bag details (Bag 1)

satLabCryopreservationSummary.title: Cryopreservation Summary
satLabCryopreservationSummary.scan_shipper: Scanned shipper label upon receipt of Apheresis product at cell processing lab
satLabCryopreservationSummary.scan_bag: Scan or enter the bag identifier prior to entering bag details (Bag 1)

satLabTransferProductToShipper.title: Transfer Product To Shipper
satLabTransferProductToShipper.case_intact_cccp: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact your Janssen Cell Therapy Coordinator.
satLabTransferProductToShipper.case_intact_1: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact Janssen.
satLabTransferProductToShipper.temp_out_of_range_cccp: Was there a temperature out-of-range alarm received? If yes, please contact your Janssen Cell Therapy Coordinator immediately and do NOT proceed until further instructions are given.
satLabTransferProductToShipper.case_intact_2: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact your Janssen Cell Therapy Coordinator.
satLabTransferProductToShipper.temp_out_of_range_1: Was there a temperature out-of-range alarm received? If yes, contact Janssen immediately and do NOT proceed until further instructions are given
satLabTransferProductToShipper.temp_out_of_range_2: Was there a temperature out-of-range alarm received? If yes, please contact your Janssen Cell Therapy Coordinator immediately and do NOT proceed until further instructions are given.
satLabTransferProductToShipper.section_heading_description: IMPORTANT: Please place the cryopreserved apheresis product into the liquid nitrogen shipper as soon as possible and ensure all checks have been performed and verified. The frozen bag is fragile. Always handle the cassette with frozen bag with care and maintain control at all times.
satLabTransferProductToShipper.remove_cassette: Remove cassette 1 from storage and scan to capture the time of this step. Next, transfer the cassette into the LN2 shipper and scan the COI number on the LN2 shipper label to capture the timestamp of this step.
satLabTransferProductToShipper.confirm_tamper: Scan or enter the COI Bag Identifier on the cassette label (Bag 1)
satLabTransferProductToShipper.air_way_tamper: Scan or enter the COI number on the LN2 shipper label.
satLabTransferProductToShipper.ambient_temperature_exposure: Confirm cryopreserved apheresis product cassette(s) were not exposed to ambient temperature greater than 3 minutes
satLabTransferProductToShipper.red_wire_tamper_seal_labeled_rack: Is the red wire tamper seal labeled "RACK" in place on the cassette rack?
satLabTransferProductToShipper.case_intactCccpJp: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact your Janssen Cell Therapy Coordinator.
satLabTransferProductToShipper.temp_out_of_rangeCccJp: Was there a temperature out-of-range alarm received? If yes, please contact your Janssen Cell Therapy Coordinator immediately and do NOT proceed until further instructions are given.

satLabShippingChecklist.title: Shipment Checklist
satLabShippingChecklist.airway: Please enter air waybill number for shipment.
satLabShippingChecklist.ln2_shipper: Please enter the last 4 digits of the EVO-IS Number on the LN2 shipper lid
satLabShippingChecklist.confirm_ln2_shipper: Does the EVO-IS Number listed on the Air Waybill match the EVO-IS Number on the LN2 shipper lid?
satLabShippingChecklist.confirm_wire: Is the red wire tamper seal in place for the LN2 shipper lid?
satLabShippingChecklist.confirm_tamper: Please enter the Tamper Seal Number on LN2 shipper lid.
satLabShippingChecklist.air_way_tamper: Does the Tamper Seal Number listed on the Air Waybill match the Tamper Seal Number on the LN2 shipper lid?
satLabShippingChecklist.confirm_shipper: Is the shipper label(s) included with the shipper?
satLabShippingChecklist.packingInsert: Is the packing insert(s) included with the shipper?
satLabShippingChecklist.consignee: Is the Consignee kit pouch included with the shipper?
satLabShippingChecklist.aadditional_comment: Please enter additional comments about the shipment.
